publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Sunzi said:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: The art of war

sense.def: warfare

tls:text.tls:line: is of of vital importance to the state.

sense.def: (in general:) the state

tls:text.tls:line: is of of vital importance to the state.

sense.def: important, substantial; the most important 甚大

tls:text.tls:line: is of of vital importance to the state.

sense.def: affairs; matter, thing; subject matter (of a painting) 不然之事

tls:text.tls:line: It is a matter of life and death,

sense.def: life on earth; one's dying or staying alive

tls:text.tls:line: It is a matter of life and death,

sense.def: the decisive point (that determines an outcome)

tls:text.tls:line: a road either to safety or to ruin.

sense.def: existence or otherwise

tls:text.tls:line: Hence it is a subject of inquiry which [can] on no account be neglected.

sense.def: should by all means be V-ed

tls:text.tls:line: Hence it is a subject of inquiry which [can] on no account be neglected.

sense.def: have to; must; should by all means; should not fail to

tls:text.tls:line: The art of war, then, is governed by five constant factors,

sense.def: the result is; consequently

tls:text.tls:line: The art of war, then, is governed by five constant factors,

sense.def: govern well, govern properly; deal with efficiently as the person responsible

tls:text.tls:line: The art of war, then, is governed by five constant factors,

sense.def: five types of obligatory behaviour/tasks 指古代統治者修身的五件事，謂貌恭、言從、視明、聽聰、思睿。《書‧洪範》："五事：一曰貌，二曰言，三曰視，四曰聽，五曰思。貌曰恭，言曰從，視曰明，聽曰聰，思曰睿。"

tls:text.tls:line: The art of war, then, is governed by five constant factors,

sense.def: (especially official) matter, especially: public task, official business; public event; public project, (military) undertaking, task; one's professional concern 五事

tls:text.tls:line: to be taken into account in one's deliberations,

sense.def: To V by using> by means of N; with

tls:text.tls:line: to be taken into account in one's deliberations,

sense.def: arithmetics; calculation of an amount; calculation of the relevant advantages

tls:text.tls:line: when seeking to determine the conditions obtaining in the field.

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:line: when seeking to determine the conditions obtaining in the field.

sense.def: inquire into, try to find out about

tls:text.tls:line: when seeking to determine the conditions obtaining in the field.

sense.def: real facts of a matter, real state of affairs; real facts of a case

tls:text.tls:line: These are: (1) The Moral Law;

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: These are: (1) The Moral Law;

sense.def: mass noun that can be counted and specified as being somebody's: way, or the way of doing something; ways (of the world)

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Heaven;

sense.def: the second item

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Heaven;

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Heaven;

sense.def: seasonal conditions, including weather conditions

tls:text.tls:line: (3) Earth;

sense.def: the third item

tls:text.tls:line: (3) Earth;

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: (3) Earth;

sense.def: terrain, military relevant geografic features

tls:text.tls:line: (4) The Commander;

sense.def: the fourth item

tls:text.tls:line: (4) The Commander;

sense.def: general, commander

tls:text.tls:line: (5) Method and discipline.

sense.def: the fifth item

tls:text.tls:line: (5) Method and discipline.

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: (5) Method and discipline.

sense.def: military orders

tls:text.tls:line: The Moral Law

sense.def: ideology, standard way of thinking imposed on a group or dominating a group

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: cause to, get (someone) to (do something); send (someone to do somthing)

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: in interaction with; in association with; with; in collusion with, in cooperation with (NB: MOVE THE HOSTILE CASES TO THE HOSTILE VARIANT!)

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: (compared/related etc) with

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: the leadership; those who are of superior rank, those in high social or political positions;

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: agree as to (e.g. desires, but differ as to function); be the same in 同類 "be the same in kind"

tls:text.tls:line: causes the people to be in complete accord with the ruler,

sense.def: (political) intentions, ambitions

tls:text.tls:line: so that they will follow him

sense.def: risk one's life

tls:text.tls:line: regardless of their lives,

sense.def: try to survive

tls:text.tls:line: Undismayed by any danger.

sense.def: be afraid of

tls:text.tls:line: Undismayed by any danger.

sense.def: imminent peril, danger; state of danger; precariousness

seg.line: 高下、遠近、險易、廣狹、死生也；

tls:text.tls:srcline: 高下、遠近、險易、廣狹、死生也；
tls:text.tls:line: distances, great and small; danger and security; open ground and narrow passes; the chances of life and death.

sense.def: relative distance

tls:text.tls:srcline: 高下、遠近、險易、廣狹、死生也；
tls:text.tls:line: distances, great and small; danger and security; open ground and narrow passes; the chances of life and death.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 高下、遠近、險易、廣狹、死生也；

tls:text.tls:srcline: 高下、遠近、險易、廣狹、死生也；

sense.def: survivability (of a terrain)

tls:text.tls:line: The Commander stands for the virtues of

sense.def: general, commander

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom, sincerity, benevolence, courage and strictness.

sense.def: intellect; intellectual competence, professional competence; intelligence, intellectual capacity

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom, sincerity, benevolence, courage and strictness.

sense.def: credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom, sincerity, benevolence, courage and strictness.

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom, sincerity, benevolence, courage and strictness.

sense.def: valour; boldness

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom, sincerity, benevolence, courage and strictness.

sense.def: severity, sternness; capability to ensure strict discipline

tls:text.tls:line: By method and discipline are to be understood

sense.def: military orders

tls:text.tls:line: the marshalling of the army in its proper subdivisions, the gradiations of rank among the officers, the maintenance of roads by which supplies may reach the army, and the control of military expenditure.

sense.def: units, gained as a result of subdivision.

tls:text.tls:line: the marshalling of the army in its proper subdivisions, the gradiations of rank among the officers, the maintenance of roads by which supplies may reach the army, and the control of military expenditure.

sense.def: military unit's set up

sense.def: office-holder, officer, official

tls:text.tls:line: the marshalling of the army in its proper subdivisions, the gradiations of rank among the officers, the maintenance of roads by which supplies may reach the army, and the control of military expenditure.

sense.def: (traditionally: two-track) wide road suitable for carts; main thoroughfare

tls:text.tls:line: the marshalling of the army in its proper subdivisions, the gradiations of rank among the officers, the maintenance of roads by which supplies may reach the army, and the control of military expenditure.

sense.def: be the leader of; be in charge of (tasks), take responsibility for; preside over

tls:text.tls:line: the marshalling of the army in its proper subdivisions, the gradiations of rank among the officers, the maintenance of roads by which supplies may reach the army, and the control of military expenditure.

sense.def: set of things needed

sense.def: 此三者

sense.def: be five in number

sense.def: win the day, win victory; gain the upper hand; keep the upper hand; prevail; be victorious

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, in your deliberations,

sense.def: therefore; thus; and similarly [new paragraph]; the point is thusNOTE: the syntax is nadV.postS

sense.def: to systematize (someting N1) on the basis of (someting N2, e.g. previous calculations)

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, in your deliberations,

sense.def: arithmetics; calculation of an amount; calculation of the relevant advantages

tls:text.tls:line: when seeking to determine the military conditions, let them be made the basis of a comparison,

tls:text.tls:line: in this wise:

sense.def: go on to say: "S" (with omitted subject)

tls:text.tls:line: (1) Which of the two sovereigns is imbued with the Moral Law?

sense.def: ruler; host; lord/ruler, owner (as being primarily in charge of territories and/or things)

tls:text.tls:line: (1) Which of the two sovereigns is imbued with the Moral Law?

sense.def: which one?; (contrastive) who?

tls:text.tls:line: (1) Which of the two sovereigns is imbued with the Moral Law?

sense.def: be characterised by an abstract feature

tls:text.tls:line: (1) Which of the two sovereigns is imbued with the Moral Law?

sense.def: ideology, standard way of thinking imposed on a group or dominating a group

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Which of the two generals has the most ability?

sense.def: general, commander

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Which of the two generals has the most ability?

sense.def: which one?; (contrastive) who?

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Which of the two generals has the most ability?

sense.def: be characterised by an abstract feature

tls:text.tls:line: (2) Which of the two generals has the most ability?

sense.def: capability; physical capability, concrete technical capability; potential, capacity 人各有能

sense.def: seasonal conditions, including weather conditions

sense.def: terrain, military relevant geografic features

sense.def: which one?; (contrastive) who?

sense.def: obtain (abstract things like the Way etc), acquire features

tls:text.tls:line: (4) On which side is discipline most rigorously enforced?

sense.def: military orders

sense.def: command, order

sense.def: which one?; (contrastive) who?

tls:text.tls:line: (4) On which side is discipline most rigorously enforced?

sense.def: cause (laws) to be carried out

tls:text.tls:line: (5) Which army is the stronges?

sense.def: mass of soldiers, troops

sense.def: whose 士卒孰練 "Whose soldiers are better trained"

tls:text.tls:line: (5) Which army is the stronges?

sense.def: to be stronger

tls:text.tls:line: (6) On which side are officers and men more highly trained?

sense.def: officer on a war chariot who is protected by shield and helmet

tls:text.tls:line: (6) On which side are officers and men more highly trained?

sense.def: whose 士卒孰練 "Whose soldiers are better trained"

tls:text.tls:line: (6) On which side are officers and men more highly trained?

sense.def: to be better trained (in military affairs)

tls:text.tls:line: (7) In which army is there the greater constancy both in reward and punishment?

sense.def: the making of rewards

tls:text.tls:line: (7) In which army is there the greater constancy both in reward and punishment?

sense.def: punishment through fines; more generally: punitive action

tls:text.tls:line: (7) In which army is there the greater constancy both in reward and punishment?

sense.def: which one?; (contrastive) who?

tls:text.tls:line: (7) In which army is there the greater constancy both in reward and punishment?

sense.def: be evident; be transparent; be clearly visible

tls:text.tls:line: Attack him where he is unprepared,

sense.def: launch an attack (which is not necessarily successful) against; direct attack; assault, personally attack (a person); sometimes used very generally: attack (an opponent, in any way) [The examples have to be distributed into the subcategories below.]

tls:text.tls:line: Attack him where he is unprepared,

sense.def: aspect in which one lacks enough preparation

sense.def: to appear at (a place N)

sense.def: too early, earlier than it should be

tls:text.tls:line: If you know yourself but not the enemy,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:text.tls:line: If you know neither the enemy nor yourself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:text.tls:line: To secure ourselves against defeat lies in our own hands,

sense.def: himself, herself

tls:text.tls:line: If we wish to fight,

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:text.tls:line: If we do not wish to fight,

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:text.tls:line: we can keep our forces concentrated, while the enemy’s must be divided.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:text.tls:line: our opponents will be in dire straits.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:text.tls:line: The spot where we intend to fight must not be made known;

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:text.tls:line: the numbers we shall have to face at any given point will be proportionately few.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:text.tls:line: comes from compelling the adversary to make these preparations against us.

sense.def: object pronoun, resumptive, non-contrastive: oneself, himself, herself, themselves

seg.line: 角之而知有餘不足之處。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 角之而知有餘不足之處。
tls:text.tls:line: Carefully compare the opposing army with your own, so that you may know where strength is superabundant and where it is deficient.

sense.def: Buddhist: feature in a thing

tls:text.tls:line: If you know your enemy and know yourself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:text.tls:line: He carries out his own secret designs,

sense.def: emphatic or contrastive form of 其； (often but not always contrastive:) one's his/her/its own N; all of one's own (and special)
